name: Weight
title: Weight
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent that a patient's weight has been measured.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Physical Exam, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying a patient's weight has been measured. This is a grouping of LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes for patient's ideal body weight, estimated body weight and measured/calculated body fat.)
